description: AbstractAtomicTimeseries represents the attributes and relationships that are common to all kinds of atomic timeseries (GenericTimeseries, TabulatedFileTimeseries, StandardFileTimeseries). An atomic timeseries represents time-varying data of a specific data type for a single contiguous time interval.

properties.name: observationProperty
properties.description: Specifies the phenomenon for which the atomic timeseries provides observation values.

properties.name: uom
properties.description: Specifies the unit of measurement of the observation values.
